about_the_game:
This is the digital copy of The Art of Fausts Alptraum.
This 96-paged book includes all the painting, character designs, arts from the trial version, and the conceptional paintings from the game Fausts Alptraum. It is same with the paper copy we published by our own in Taiwan.

To Access "The Art of Fausts Alptraum ," Please follow the instructions below after the download is done:
1. Right click "Fausts Alptraum " in your Steam Library and select "Properties."
2. Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files.”
3. Within Fausts Alptraum's local files, find the folder titled "DLC_The Art of Fausts Alptraum."
4. The Art of Fausts Alptraum PDF file can be found within the folder.
